glosses: to be necessary, be needed, be required

examples.translation: You have to go to work.

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish كركمك (gerekmek, “to be needful, be necessary, be fitting, be suitable, be lacking”), reflexive of Proto-Turkic *kẹrge- (“to need”). Cognate with Old Turkic [script needed] (kerge-, “to lack, require, need”), Azerbaijani gərəkmək and gərək, see the last for more cognates.
